forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun this morning with increasing clouds this afternoon. High around 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High 67F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 21C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 69F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High around 65F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
